name: Cat Shooter - Feed the Feral Kittens by Shooting Those Bad Birds!
name_original: Cat Shooter - Feed the Feral Kittens by Shooting Those Bad Birds!
description:
You’ve cat to be kitten me right meow!!! We know you love cats! So shooting cute cats is a No No!

But how much you love cats? Can you help this awesomely cute pal shoot as many birds as you can for some tasty birds for dinner? We know its all about the Meow! Can’t resist to help this cute cat get his snacks.

And you don’t need any more reason to get this right meow! Just shoot down those pesky birds. READY, AIM….. SHOOT!!

Bring extra purr to the game and try to shoot more birds to get to the next level! You’ve got to get this adorable cat to the next level for more extra fun and challenges!

The cat shooting game you are looking at right meow features:

» iOS7, iPad Air, iPhone 5C and 5S ready!
» Many colorful birds to shoot!
» Sweet music!
» Super awesomely cute cat!!

So, what are waiting for? Download this game, right meow!!!

Note there are no in app purchases in this app but it is advert supported :)

If you love this game, please support it by leaving a review in the app store. Thanks for your help we really appreciate it!
